browser_title.description: Title shown for browser icon when enabled.

browser_title_disabled.description: Title shown for icon when extension disabled (i.e. can't connect to deluge).

error_generic.message: Connection Problem - Unable to connect to Deluge Web UI.
error_generic.description: Generic error message shown when connection problems occur.

error_unauthenticated.message: Unable to connect to Deluge Web UI. Please login manually or check your password in the options.
error_unauthenticated.description: Shown when auto login has failed to connect to Deluge.

message_torrents_loading.description: Shown on the popup before torrents are loaded.

message_torrents_none_queue.description: Shown on the popup when there are no torrents in queue.

message_torrents_none_filter.description: Shown on the popup when all torrents are filtered out.

filter_option_label_sort_column.description: Shown on the popup, sort options label.

sort_column_option_name.description: Shown on the popup, sort options - torrent name.

sort_column_option_total_size.description: Shown on the popup, sort options - torrent total size.

sort_column_option_progress.description: Shown on the popup, sort options - torrent download progress percent.

sort_column_option_upload_payload_rate.description: Shown on the popup, sort options - torrent upload speed.

sort_column_option_download_payload_rate.description: Shown on the popup, sort options - torrent download speed.

sort_column_option_eta.description: Shown on the popup, sort options - torrent eta.

sort_column_option_queue.description: Shown on the popup, sort options - torrent queue position.

filter_option_label_state.description: Shown on the popup, filter options - State label.

filter_option_label_tracker.description: Shown on the popup, filter options - Tracker label.

filter_option_label_label.description: Shown on the popup, filter options - Label label.

filter_option_label_invert.description: Shown on the popup, for each filter option - Invert label.

global_info_total.description: Shown on the popup, in the global totals - total torrents.

global_info_downloading.description: Shown on the popup, in the global totals - downloading torrents.

global_info_seeding.description: Shown on the popup, in the global totals - seeding torrents.

global_info_paused.description: Shown on the popup, in the global totals - paused torrents.

global_info_queued.description: Shown on the popup, in the global totals - queued torrents.
